title: Game in progress
body: Currently my pc turned off in whilst in the beginning of a game. I turn it back on and log back into league and my duo is still in the game but I can't get back in. It just says Game in Progress. Any way to fix this? I really don't want a leaver buster (this happened twice, this being the second time). Ive tried turning my pc on and off, relogging into league, and running the hextec tool repair.

replies.body: Hmmmm looks like the game is trying to load but just hasn't been able to. I'd look in task manager, make sure all league processes are ended, then open League back up and you should be able to get back in the game. Let us know in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) that this happened if you end up with an LPQ.

You know what is bother some, I just got dced, not from my internet Im and hard wired. I tried doing it through the task manager. Nothing is working. What happened to the button that allowed us to reconnect. Why/how is this happening
I tried that as well, I'll do it again. The game just finished. But it is upsetting that this happened, not only for me but for my teammates as well.
